languages.text: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception
languages.original_text: Все союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} получают {uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} (7): союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают бонус +7 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к Восприятию

traits.locale_text: All allies targeted by the Navigator powers gain +(Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Movement Points{/g} at their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} 7: Allies targeted by the Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

Все союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} получают +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} 7: союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают бонус +7 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к Восприятию

languages.text: 所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时会额外获得{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（7）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高7点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10感知
languages.original_text: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: 所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时会额外获得{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（7）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高7点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10感知

languages.text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった味方全員が次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で、{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}(7)：航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった味方は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対してボーナス7を獲得する。このボーナスはスタックされ、スタックのたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+5増加 認知力が+10増加
languages.original_text: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった味方全員が次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で、(航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)の追加{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}7：航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった味方は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての能力に対してボーナスを7獲得。ボーナスはスタックされ、スタックする度に航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+5 認知力+10

languages.text: Todos los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante obtienen +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicionales en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} (7): Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una bonificación de +7 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el siguiente turno del navegante cada vez que se acumula. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de Percepción
languages.original_text: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante obtienen +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante / 2) de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicionales en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} 7: Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una bonificación de +7 a todas sus características hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de Percepción

languages.text: Alle Verbündeten, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erhalten zusätzlich +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} für ihren nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g} (7): Verbündete, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Navigators einen Bonus von +7 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Bonus ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 Wahrnehmung
languages.original_text: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Alle Verbündeten, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erhalten zusätzlich +(Navigator-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} /2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchdringend{/g} 7: Verbündete, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erlangen bis zum Ende des nächsten Navigator-Zugs einen Bonus von +7 auf sämtliche Eigenschaften. Dieser Bonus addiert sich und wird pro Addition bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 Wahrnehmung

languages.text: Tous les alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur bénéficient de +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires lors de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} (7) : un bonus de +7 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +10 de Perception
languages.original_text: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du Navigateur bénéficient de +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Navigateur / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires lors de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusion{/g} 7 : un bonus de +7 s'applique à toutes les caractéristiques des alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du Navigateur jusqu'à la fin du tour suivant de celui-ci. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du Navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +10 de Perception

languages.text: Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı tüm dost birimler, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turlarında{/g} +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanırlar. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Aşılayıcı{/g} (7): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı dost birimler, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +7 bonus alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +10 Algı
languages.original_text: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception
